Producer: Éric Altmayer, Nicolas Altmayer, Christophe Lambert
Production Co: arte France Cinéma, Mandarin Cinéma, Orange Studio, EuropaCorp, Scope Pictures
Rating: R (Some Language|Graphic Nudity|Strong Sexual Situations|Substance Abuse)
Synopsis: Born in Algeria, Yves Saint Laurent (Gaspard Ulliel) moves to France and utilizes his creativity to become an icon of the fashion industry.
Title: Saint Laurent
